short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remebers your last Chipotle order and fills it in automatically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chipotle Order Automator will remember your most recent Chipotle order. Whenever you next order Chipotle, it will automatically fill in your order. Saving you precious seconds!
